name: Brite
headline: Software that helps employees pick their employee benefits.
description: Brite is disrupting the employee benefits education space by building a platform that allows employee benefits brokerages to build digital benefit guides that drive employees to enroll in the right plans and understand their benefits better. To those who are in the industry...we are the "Employee Navigator" of benefits education software.

founders.name: Landon Fielding, Founder & CEO
founders.description: Proud husband and father (of 4 boys), avid ski junkie, and anything outdoors. All I know for work is employee benefits.

founders.name: Jake Parkinson, Founder
founders.description: I am passionate about frontend development

# Benefit Education That’s Fast, Frictionless and Effective
With Brite, you can deliver high-quality benefits education to clients of any size with digital guides and decision support tools.
[Get a Demo](https://britebenefits.com/</resources/contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/673bcbb0d35bffbe8198e226_Hero%20Image.png)
More than
2 million employees
Discover their benefits with Brite!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/6758eccc9bc67b8535b8e347_Efficient%20Tools%20-%20Icon.svg)
Efficient tools your clients will absolutely love!
Deliver amazing benefits education regardless of complexity. Create a digital benefits guide in hours instead of weeks: no tutorials, no custom development, no problem. 
[Get Started](https://britebenefits.com/</solutions/brite-for-hr>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/675a6e8341d9739de5451670_Efficient%20Tools%20-%20Image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/6758eb93c717ad1babbe7e6c_Better%20Together%20Icon.svg)
Create Better Benefits Together
Enhance client relationships with collaboration tools like comments and notifications, to make the approval process smoother and more efficient than ever.
[Get Started](https://britebenefits.com/</solutions/brite-for-hr>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/67578e3c506538f382d5d437_Better%20Together.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/675a6c89e3ac8d25a816eb1f_ChartBar.svg)
Optimize Benefits Education and Increase Conversion
Take action with Brite analytics to enhance benefits education, boost employee engagement, and increase overall enrollment.
[Get Started](https://britebenefits.com/</solutions/brite-for-hr>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657c7902abeae51dbdbdd438/675a6f5df4832bc60bb1d241_Optimize%20-%20Image.png)
Level-Up Your Benefits Education Experience
**See how our platform helps teams create more engaging benefits communications**
[Get a Demo](https://britebenefits.com/</resources/contact>)

generated_description:
**Brite: Simplifying Employee Benefits Education**

Founded in 2020 and born out of Y Combinator’s S21 batch, Brite is on a mission to transform the employee benefits landscape. Based in Salt Lake City, Utah, this innovative startup has quickly made a name for itself by providing a platform that simplifies the way employees understand and select their benefits.

### What They Do

Brite serves as a valuable resource for employees, benefits brokers, HR teams, and carriers alike. Their platform enables employee benefits brokerages to create digital benefit guides that facilitate better enrollment in plans while enhancing employees' comprehension of their benefits. Imagine being able to craft a guide in hours instead of weeks—no cumbersome tutorials or daunting custom development required. That’s the convenience Brite aims to deliver.

Their vision positions Brite as the "Employee Navigator" of benefits education software, and with over 2 million employees discovering their benefits through Brite, this claim holds weight. They’re not just about simplifying the experience; they’re also keen on analytics and engagement, helping companies optimize benefits education and boost overall enrollment.

### Key Features

1. **Digital Guides**: The cornerstone of their offering—streamlined guides that demystify benefits for employees.
   
2. **User-Friendly Tools**: Effortless creation of digital guides enables organizations of any size to access high-quality benefits education without the usual headaches.

3. **Enhanced Collaboration**: With tools for clients to comment and notify each other, the approval process between HR teams and brokers becomes smooth and effective.

4. **Analytics-Driven**: Brite integrates analytics to empower businesses to enhance their education initiatives and foster employee engagement.

### The Team Behind Brite

With a lean team of 15 passionate individuals, Brite has agilely navigated the competitive landscape. Leading their charge is Dalton Caldwell, a Group Partner from Y Combinator, adding a wealth of experience and vision to the startup.

### The Takeaway

In a world where employee benefits can often seem overwhelming, Brite is not just another software solution. It's a beacon for clarity, helping companies and their employees make informed decisions about their benefits. If you're in HR or are a benefits broker looking to elevate your offerings, the Brite platform might just be what you need.

Check out their [website here](https://britebenefits.com/) to learn more and see how Brite can improve your benefits education strategy!
